title: Sex on the Beach Scented Lotion 180ml (2-90ml bottle set)
features: A wonderfully sophisticated Caribbean sweet citrus tropical scent created for male or female
Smell delicious after a warm bath or shower by applying this rich lotion all over your body or use wherever desired
Use the lotion alone or before applying scented essential oil, perfume or body spray, for a layered aroma
Makes a great gift for yourself or someone else for birthdays, holidays or any other special occasion
Made in the USA, this listing was created by sprucing gear and is the owner of the upc code and the only supplier of the my life scents brand
description: A wonderfully sophisticated Caribbean sweet citrus tropical scent. It was created for male or female. 2 Bottles 90 ml each scented lotion (180 ml total). Bottles are press top and come with a laced ribbon tie that matches the label color. Smell delicious after a warm bath or shower by applying this rich lotion all over your body or use wherever desired. This non greasy cream could also be used for a scented massage. Use the lotion alone or before applying scented essential oil, perfume or body spray, for a layered aroma. Made in the USA. This listing was created by sprucing gear and is the owner of the upc code and the only supplier of the my life scents brand.
